Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowContractBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IContractBehavior
public ref class WorkflowContractBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IContractBehavior
type WorkflowContractBehaviorAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IContractBehavior

Docs.summary: An attribute that can be applied to a service contract to enable workflow service model dispatch behavior. This attribute ensures that appropriate dispatch components are created.
